name: Shadow Servant
description:
This is my first Game Jam Entry, and my second project over all, which lead to me managing my time really bad. There are still some elements that i like, so i thought i'd upload it anyway! Since i did not have time for a tutorial:

How to Play:

- Move with W/A/S/D

- Shoot with left mouse button. You can only carry two bullets at a time, collect a pickup, dropped by an enemy to replenish your ammunition!

- Melee Attack with right mouse button

- Lanters slow you when you get close to them. Shoot them to extinguish them!

Your goal is to stop the rival rituals cult. Sadly there is no ending screen, so now, that you have reached the end when you destroyed the ritual circle!
